  1. from django.db import transaction
  2. from django.http import HttpResponseRedirect
  3. from django.contrib.contenttypes.models import ContentType
  5. from . import PermissionRoleAdmin
  6. @transaction.commit_on_success
  7. def admin_move_ordered_model(request, direction, model_type_id, model_id):
  8. if direction == "up":
  9. PermissionRoleAdmin.move_up(model_type_id, model_id)
  10. else:
  11. PermissionRoleAdmin.move_down(model_type_id, model_id)
  13. ModelClass = ContentType.objects.get(id=model_type_id).model_class()
  15. app_label = ModelClass._meta.app_label
  16. model_name = ModelClass.__name__.lower()
  18. redirect_url = request.META.get('HTTP_REFERER')
  19. if redirect_url is None:
  20. redirect_url = "/admin/%s/%s/" % (app_label, model_name)
  22. return HttpResponseRedirect(redirect_url)
